verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_3: What will explain to you what the Shocker is?
verse.verse_4: The Day when the people will be like scattered moths.
verse.verse_5: And the mountains will be like tufted wool.
verse.verse_6: As for he whose scales are heavy.
verse.verse_7: He will be in a pleasant life.
verse.verse_8: But as for he whose scales are light.
verse.verse_10: Do you know what it is?
